CAPITOL RECORDS TOWER - decrepit and abandoned - leans precariously in the background.
In front of the building’s Art Deco rotunda and towering curved facade,
a media circus of paparazzi, reporters and fans gather behind barricades.
The steps of the Hall of Justice

The awe-inspiring MONOCORP Tower is a 91-story, golden, art deco tapered obelisk. On the building’s illuminated ornamental CROWN, a giant four-sided jumbotron video screen broadcasts a montage of Monocorp products.
Monocorp’s penthouse media center overlooks the city. CIGARETTE SMOKE wafts in the air. a raised stage surrounded by video screens
The dark shadowy club features cheaply designed stage props

The club features a cheaply designed fiberglass, foam alien garden set design. It’s a faux bio-luminescent grassland teeming with “exotic” plants and underwater coral reefs and plankton. More depressing than magical.
Corporate boardroom with full screen video presentation
The conference room is dark and accented by ambient lighting. A glowing, circular WAR TABLE is in the center surrounded by VIDEO SCREEN walls with ads of Roxie Star

The conference room is dark and accented by ambient lighting. A glowing, circular WAR TABLE is in the center surrounded by VIDEO SCREEN walls that loop ultra stylish Monocorp consumer ads for everything from weapons to breakfast cereal.
Decrepit Hotel prison, barbed wire neon sign
Club Opium is a mix of a luxurious Parisian cabaret, a hookah bar, and an imitation of opium dens of the past.

Siamese Sex Show - an augmented reality sex club. Just outside the entrance is the hologram of a creepy vintage HOLLYWOOD MOVIE USHER (white, 23, ghoulish face with classic jacket, trousers, hat and flashlight.) Ash falls like snowflakes.
a BAZAAR with CHRISTMAS LIGHTS strung up over WET MARKETS and RATIONING BOOTHS.
Art-deco inspired interior combines flickering lights, twisted and distorted geometric patterns, and shadows.
